content.body: I thought at some point we were going to add a PromiseReject() abstract op? ljharb do you remember this? Maybe I was dreaming.
I added PromiseResolve but there wasn’t a need for a PromiseReject one - happy to add it tho, i like abstract ops :-)
We might want it in Web IDL eventually, but I guess better to wait until we have spec text that would use it.
certainly agreed it should probably wait for a second use case
whether that’s idl or a proposal
